text: Nigba ti (Anabi) ’Ibrohim so pe: "Oluwa mi, fi han mi bi Iwo yo se so awon oku di alaaye." (Allahu) so pe: “Se iwo ko gbagbo ni?” O so pe: “Rara, sugbon ki okan mi le bale ni”. (Allahu) so pe: "Mu merin ninu awon eye, ki o so won mole si odo re (ki o pa won, ki o si gun won papo mora won). Leyin naa, fi ipin ninu won sori apata kookan. Leyin naa, pe won. Won maa sare wa ba o. Ki o si mo pe dajudaju Allahu ni Alagbara, Ologbon
